snippet: ANDERSON--George Spencer. Cherished son of Gavin and Valia, adored brother of Tegwyn (Peter) and Kylie (Ken) and wonderful uncle to Gannon, Fiona, Kiera and Veronica, passed away unexpectedly on April 4, 2016 in Salt Lake City at age 33. Alumnus of the Buckley School and Trinity School in New York City and also Tulane and SUNY Purchase universities. He will be sadly missed but loved forever by all those who knew him. 1/3

Alumnus of the Buckley School and Trinity School in New York City and also Tulane and SUNY Purchase universities. He will be sadly missed but loved forever by all those who knew him. 1/3
